sourcesContent: import { Box, Typography, useMediaQuery, useTheme, } from "@mui/material"; import Grid from '@mui/material/Unstable_Grid2'; import React from "react"; const CategorySection = () => { const theme = useTheme(); const isSmallScreen = useMediaQuery(theme.breakpoints.down("md")); const num = isSmallScreen ? 2 : 6; return ( Popular Categories Chair 15 products Chair 15 products ) }; export default CategorySection ;
